title: Metro Kitchen and Drinkery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. A vibrant lifestyle beverage and food company unique to Sacramento. A farm-to-fork, plant-centric cafe focusing on vegan and gluten free offerings. 
All items are made-in-house. Menu includes organic cold-pressed juices, juice cleanses, teas and tonics, bites, bowls, small plates and coffee, local beer, ciders and cocktails. Sources local and organic ingredients. Serves a variety of vegan dishes, including ratatouille tart with cornmeal crust, Italian vegetable soup, roasted vegetable sandwich, a variety of salads and an array of desserts. Wi-Fi.
